an5.54:4.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu jiṇṇo hoti jarāyābhibhūto.
an5.54:5.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu byādhito hoti byādhinābhibhūto.
an5.54:6.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, dubbhikkhaṃ hoti dussassaṃ dullabhapiṇḍaṃ, na sukaraṃ uñchena paggahena yāpetuṃ.
an5.54:7.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, bhayaṃ hoti aṭavisaṅkopo, cakkasamārūḷhā jānapadā pariyāyanti.
an5.54:8.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, saṅgho bhinno hoti.
an5.54:8.2: Saṅghe kho pana, bhikkhave, bhinne aññamaññaṃ akkosā ca honti, aññamaññaṃ paribhāsā ca honti, aññamaññaṃ parikkhepā ca honti, aññamaññaṃ pariccajā ca honti.
an5.54:8.3: Tattha appasannā ceva nappasīdanti, pasannānañca ekaccānaṃ aññathattaṃ hoti.
an5.54:8.5: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca asamayā padhānāyāti.
an5.54:9.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu daharo hoti yuvā susu kāḷakeso bhadrena yobbanena samannāgato paṭhamena vayasā.
an5.54:10.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu appābādho hoti appātaṅko, samavepākiniyā gahaṇiyā samannāgato nātisītāya nāccuṇhāya majjhimāya padhānakkhamāya.
an5.54:11.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, subhikkhaṃ hoti susassaṃ sulabhapiṇḍaṃ, sukaraṃ uñchena paggahena yāpetuṃ.
an5.54:12.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, manussā samaggā sammodamānā avivadamānā khīrodakībhūtā aññamaññaṃ piyacakkhūhi sampassantā viharanti.
an5.54:13.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, saṃgho samaggo sammodamāno avivadamāno ekuddeso phāsu viharati.
an5.54:13.2: Saṃghe kho pana, bhikkhave, samagge na ceva aññamaññaṃ akkosā honti, na ca aññamaññaṃ paribhāsā honti, na ca aññamaññaṃ parikkhepā honti, na ca aññamaññaṃ pariccajā honti.
an5.54:13.3: Tattha appasannā ceva pasīdanti, pasannānañca bhiyyobhāvo hoti.
an5.54:13.5: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca samayā padhānāyā”ti.
